product_name: USAOPOLY Holiday Edition Jenga Game - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Gather friends and family together for a festive round of USAopoly Holiday Edition Jenga. Instead of plain wood, the blocks are red and green with holiday messages. Players take turns removing a block from the solid tower and placing it on top. As the tower builds, so does the difficulty; the last person to place a block without the tower collapsing wins. Designed for ages 6+. Closeout.
short_description: Gather friends and family together for a festive round of USAopoly Holiday Edition Jenga. Instead of plain wood, the blocks are red and green with holiday messages.
